tasks.label: Build and Release Windows
args: & { Write-Host 'Compilando aplicação Flutter para Windows...'; flutter clean; flutter pub get; flutter build windows --release; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host 'Build concluído com sucesso!'; $version = (Select-String -Path 'pubspec.yaml' -Pattern 'version: (.+)').Matches[0].Groups[1].Value; Write-Host "Versão detectada: $version"; $releaseDir = "build/windows/x64/runner/Release"; if (Test-Path $releaseDir) { Write-Host 'Criando arquivo ZIP do release...'; $zipName = "scrcpy_launcher_v${version}_windows_x64.zip"; Compress-Archive -Path "$releaseDir/*" -DestinationPath $zipName -Force; Write-Host "Arquivo criado: $zipName"; Write-Host 'Para criar o release no GitHub:'; Write-Host "1. Vá para https://github.com/zonaro/list_extensions/releases/new"; Write-Host "2. Tag version: v$version"; Write-Host "3. Release title: scrcpy Launcher v$version"; Write-Host '4. Anexe o arquivo ZIP criado'; Write-Host "5. Adicione as notas de release"; } else { Write-Error 'Diretório de build não encontrado!' } } else { Write-Error 'Falha no build!' } }

tasks.label: Build Windows Release
args: echo 'Compilando aplicação Flutter para Windows...' && flutter clean && flutter pub get && flutter build windows --release && echo 'Build concluído!' && echo 'Criando arquivo ZIP...' && cd build/windows/x64/runner/Release && powershell Compress-Archive -Path './*' -DestinationPath '../../../../../scrcpy_launcher_windows_x64.zip' -Force && cd ../../../../../ && echo 'Arquivo ZIP criado: scrcpy_launcher_windows_x64.zip' && echo 'Para criar o release no GitHub:' && echo '1. Vá para https://github.com/zonaro/list_extensions/releases/new' && echo '2. Anexe o arquivo scrcpy_launcher_windows_x64.zip' && echo '3. Adicione as notas de release'
